root.name: Star-Twine
root.description: PC System RequirementsMinimum:OS: Windows XP/Vista/7Processor: 1.5GHz CPUMemory: 256MB available RAMHard Disk: 200MB available disk space (Additional 200MB for .NET Framework 3.5 if it is not already installed)Video Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible card with Shader Model 2.0 Support and 256MB VRAM (NVidia GeForce 7600 / ATI Radeon x1600 or better recommended)
